name: Amazon SNS (Simple Notification Service) Email Notification
short: A scalable messaging and mobile notifications service for coordinating the delivery of messages to subscribing endpoints and clients on AWS.
description: Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) is a robust, fully-managed messaging service from AWS. It enables microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications to send pub/sub, SMS, email, or mobile push notifications to receivers. SNS supports various subscription types including HTTP/S, email, SMS, Lambda, and SQS. It provides durability and high availability, ensuring messages aren't lost. With an ability to fan out messages to a large number of subscribers, SNS is an effective tool for communication and coordination in complex systems.
